𓊩 𒂗 EN < DON < dornen thorn θρόνος thrónos throne > tyrant

𓊩 Troy ⋍ Ilias li₁ 𔔹 ⋍ 𓊩

Q2 tUr/tyr/taur-horse-seat 𓊩𓁹Horseye=Osiris𓂀;) thorseat⇔Troy 𓊩 << why?

𓈎 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓊩 | high throne | quaryt court
𓈎 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓊩 | high throne | taaryt throyt throne@Troy ( 𓈎 TAR ⋍ QAR 𓏘 )

𓎼 𓏏 𓊩 | seat | < ǧeat !!

𓏘 QAR ⋍ 𓈎 TAR
𒆪 KUR ≠ 𒂉 DUR ⚠️
𓈍 crown 𓎝 ≠ throne 𓊩 𒄑𒆪 tânj tâj taç تاج tag tiara
𓈍 הִכְתִּיר hikhtír כ־ת־ר k-t-r kéter, “crown” synthesis

𓊩 𓁹 Ashurᵘˢ ⋍ Osiris

𓈎 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓊩 | high throne | throyt throne@Troy ( 𓈎 TAR ⋍ QAR 𓏘 )

𒄑𒆪 KURᵒⁿ crown
𒄑𒆪 KURˢ throne كُرْسِيّ kursiyy kyrios 𓋞
𒄑𒆪 DURᵒⁿ throne
𒄑𒆪 DURˢ dais
